channel.title: Settings not being saved
channel.description: Every time I start the game, I have to reset all my custom settings, such as view roll to 0, difficulty to hard, speakers to 5.1, etc. Keyboard settings are saved, just nothing else. Really appreciate an answer. Keep up the good work, looking forward to BM DM.

item.title: Settings not being saved
item.dc:creator: Jotunn
item.description:
Every time I start the game, I have to reset all my custom settings, such as view roll to 0, difficulty to hard, speakers to 5.1, etc. Keyboard settings are saved, just nothing else. Really appreciate an answer. Keep up the good work, looking forward to BM DM.
